articles.author: Hugh Son
articles.title: CFPB drops lawsuit against JPMorgan Chase, Bank of America and Wells Fargo over Zelle fraud - CNBC
articles.description: Since Acting Director Russell Vought has taken over the CFPB, the agency has dropped at least a half dozen cases brought by his predecessor, Rohit Chopra.
articles.content:
The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau on Tuesday dismissed its lawsuit against the operator of the Zelle payments network and the three U.S. banks that dominate transactions on it.
The CFPB sued … [+1477 chars]

articles.title: America’s biggest donor gave $3.7 billion in 2024 - The Seattle Times
